title: Jerome Garces to referee England vs Australia as World Rugby confirm quarter-final line-up of officials
text:
Jérôme Garcès will oversee England’s quarter-final against Australia on Saturday in Oita as World Rugby roll out some of their most experienced referees to begin the knockout stages.

Elsewhere, Nigel Owens takes charge of Ireland’s meeting with New Zealand, while Jaco Peyper is appointed to Wales vs France on Sunday. Finally, Wayne Barnes referees the tie between Japan and South Africa.

Garcès, who was the man in the middle for New Zealand’s win over South Africa in Pool B as well as Ireland’s Pool A victory over Russia, last refereed England during the 2019 Six Nations. He did so twice in that tournament, looking after both England’s win against Ireland in Dublin and their loss to Wales at the...
description: Jérôme Garcès will oversee England’s quarter-final against Australia on Saturday in Oita as World Rugby roll out some of their most experienced referees to begin the knockout stages.
